name: Delivery Smash
description:
You have to look at the sign to see which item needs to be delivered. Make sure only the right items get into the van by smashing the wrong items with a sword. The items will pass on the conveyor belt, so think fast! Because if a wrong item goes through the check, you fail.

Controls:

Use 'Enter' to begin playing.

Use 'Left Mouseclick' to smash items.

Use 'Escape' to go to the main menu.

This game is made by Abstract Kessoe for the 'Mini Jame Gam #11'.

The game is made in 3 days.

All models and mechanics are made by Abstract Kessoe

The soundtrack is made by ForeverNameless (check him on Spotify)
